review: This worked absolutely amazingly.!  I got this because Time Warner was changing the cable from analog to digital, so most of the channels don't come in without a box.  Our TWC bill is already unreal, and we didn't want to add another box.  I got this and the TWC app came on the device, so now on the second TV we can use it like on our Iphones - we actually have more channels now than before.  It is great!
